entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet new should support multi-targeting #35065

Closed

  • .NET 8 CLI produces extraneous modifications when updating support packages in multitarget project #35052
  • Unable to load shared library 'hostfxr' or one of its dependencies on Alpine inside Docker #31848

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid loading all types when invoking Hot Reload handlers, handle type load failures #35077
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update branding to 7.0.402 #35074
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.309 #35073
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.112 #35072
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.415 #35071
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.318 #35070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.123 #35069
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #35068
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Validate install-scripts changes #35063
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update CODEOWNERS for libraries compat tools #35061
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #35023
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Containers: LogHttpResponseAsync: include request method, and don't format a message when trace logging is not enabled. #35062
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Updated

  • Add DOTNET_LAUNCH_PROFILE environment when invoking dotnet run #35029
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Download tool packages from NuGet feeds directly, instead of implicitly restoring #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2257066 #34880
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [main] Update dotnet/runtime #35048
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Add test for PublishSingleFile+PublishAot #34948
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • 9500 dotnet tool install: Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade when specify version #31549
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
